MS MCQs

    Output from Azure Digital Twins to downstream services - Introduction

    »

    1. Which services are used by event routes to drive your data flows?

      Event Hubs, Event Grid, Service Bus

      Azure Data Lake, Azure Synapse Analytics, Azure Logic Apps

      Azure Time Series Insights, Azure Maps, Azure Functions


    2. Event routes are defined via data plane APIs. A route definition contains:

      A route ID

      An endpoint ID

      A filter that defines which events are sent to the endpoint

      All of the above


    3. The function will send the JSON objects and eventually connect to Time Series Insights by using:

      An IoT hub

      An event hub

      A service bus
